definition: to pass on/to communicate/to transmit
see 轉文|转文[zhuai3 wen2]
to revolve/to turn/to circle about/to walk about/classifier for revolutions (per minute etc): revs, rpm/classifier for repeated actions
to turn/to change direction/to transfer/to forward (mail)
to say/to tell/to announce/to report/to denounce/to file a lawsuit/to sue

sentences.english: Please tell Mr. Luman that Mr. Fisher will not be able to keep the appointment.
sentences.chinese: 请转告鲁曼先生，费希尔先生不能如期赴约。

sentences.english: She stays and waits for Ross to return so she can tell him.
sentences.chinese: 她留下来等待罗斯返家，并打算亲口转告他。

sentences.english: I'll let him know, Mn. Brown.
sentences.chinese: 我会转告他的，布朗先生。

sentences.english: Would you mind telling me? And then I tell her.
sentences.chinese: 能告诉我吗？然后我转告她。

sentences.english: ok. i'll tell him that you called.
sentences.chinese: 好的，我转告他您来德律风了。

sentences.english: Could you tell him Seon called?
sentences.chinese: 请转告他申来过电话可以吗？

sentences.english: He panted excitedly giving us the news as he had just heard it.
sentences.chinese: 他气喘吁吁，兴奋地将他刚刚听到的消息转告给我们。

sentences.english: Transmit following to Mitsubishi firm chemical Dept case settled amicably already.
sentences.chinese: 请转告三井公司化学部，此事已获圆满解决。

sentences.english: Would you let him know, I called. this is Hance.
sentences.chinese: 请转告他我打过电话给他了，我是Hance。

sentences.english: So to her mother, Tommy said.
sentences.chinese: 于是请她母亲转告，汤米说。

sentences.english: He passed on the good news to his friends.
sentences.chinese: 他把这个好消息转告了他的朋友。

sentences.english: He wanted me to convey his apology to Mr. Wang.
sentences.chinese: 让让我向王经理转告他的歉意。

sentences.english: Would you please send my words to the girl sitting besides you?
sentences.chinese: 请把这两句话转告给你旁边的那个女孩子好吗？

sentences.english: Please tell him that Lu Ming tried to contact him.
sentences.chinese: 请你转告他陆明正设法跟他联系。

sentences.english: Could you please tell Mr. Liu (Manager Liu) …

definition: to pass on/to convey/to communicate
to pass on a story/to communicate a message
to pass on to sb/to carry and give to sb else
oral message
to tell sb/to inform
variant of 交代[jiao1 dai4]
to request sb to do sth/please!
to ask for instructions
to introduce (sb)/(esp.) to present to the emperor
to tell/to exhort/injunction
to leave word/to leave a message
to inform/to tell/to notify/notification
to report (to one's superior)
to take a letter/to send word
to warn repeatedly/to urge/to exhort again and again
to send word/to deliver a letter
